remarks: The span of a pair is a subspace (frequently used special case of ~ lspcl ).  (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lspval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspval.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspprcl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspprcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspprcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspprcl $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. S ) $.
